* '''Shortcut Keys'''
** Confirm keyboard keys (F5,F6,etc) controls screen brightness
** Confirm screen brightness dynamically adjusts with up and down with the appropriate key press

* Unplug AC adapter, screen brightness should dim (default setting, can be changed in power management)
* Plug in AC adapter, screen brightness should return to previous settings
